item.title: Charlie Kirk Is Dead After Utah Valley University Shooting
item.description: Turning Point USA cofounder Charlie Kirk was shot at an event at Utah Valley University on Wednesday. He later died from his injuries.

item.title: 3 Exciting Camera Features on Apple’s New iPhone 17 Lineup
item.description: An upgraded selfie camera with a square sensor, dual camera capture, and 8X optical-like image quality has me excited about the new iPhone 17 models.
